title: Fairness-Aware Insurance Pricing: A Multi-Objective Optimization Approach
summary: Machine learning improves predictive accuracy in insurance pricing but exacerbates trade-offs between competing fairness criteria across different discrimination measures, challenging regulators and insurers to reconcile profitability with equitable outcomes.
